Package com.sonyericsson.inject

Contains classes that supports automatic dependency injection and other types of injections of references, code and data into existing objects.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Gluey Interface that must be implemented by all classes in which injections should be made.
Singleton When a class implements this interface the framework will only spawn one instance of the class and then glue it everywhere, as opposed to the default behavior where a new instance is instantiated in for each glued field.
 

Class Summary
DuctTape A framework for dependency injection and automatic instantiation of required implementations.
 

Exception Summary
GluingException Exception indicating the failure of gluing an object reference or primitive onto an object.
 

Annotation Types Summary
Glue Marks a field for injection.
 

Package com.sonyericsson.inject Description

Contains classes that supports automatic dependency injection and other types of injections of references, code and data into existing objects.
